content: Your startmail.com on firefox does not require a setup, but email clients do. I suggest rechecking the configuration to whatever the requirements are from the email provider. Or, you can post screenshots of your incoming and outgoing server settings pane, and someone here may have suggestions
creator: davidsk

content:
All I can figure is that there was a problem in the transfer or in how it was done.

Here is the link for moving a profile in Windows when installed in default location: 

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/moving-thunderbird-data-to-a-new-computer

here is the info in brief steps:

  1. ensure thunderbird is NOT running on old machine
  2. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  3. this should open windows file explorer in Appdata\roaming folder
  4. highlight the Thunderbird folder and copy to external media
  5. ensure thunderbird is installed on second computer and NOT running
  6. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  7. you should be in Appdata\roaming folder , copy&paste the exported Thunderbird folder there. This may prompt to overwrite an existing folder of same name. allow it
  8. start thunderbird and all should be there
creator: davidsk

content: I’ve run into this before with Thunderbird after a password change. Even though IMAP works for receiving mail, sending fails if the SMTP server settings aren’t updated. Make sure your username in the outgoing server settings matches your full email, and use the recommended port and encryption type.

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content:
Dalle schermate che hai postato mi sembra solo Oauth2. Mi spiego meglio: Google sta progressivamente imponendo ai suoi utenti di usare un nuovo metodo di login chiamato Oauth2 che richiede un passaggio dal web. Il tutto è spiegato qui -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/thunderbird-gmail

La normale combinazione user+password non è più utilizzabile per Gmail.

content: TB’s default threading can be frustrating, especially with long conversations. One trick I use is to temporarily disable threading for accounts where chronological order matters. Regarding PDFs and docs, I’ve had better luck opening them externally rather than relying on the built-in preview.
creator: thomaskarker460

content: You can turn off global threading in settings.

content:
Mogelijk herkent de nieuwe installatie uw oude profiel niet; bij verwijderen wordt uw profiel normaal gesproken niet direct verwijderd, en kunt u nog toegang tot de gegevens krijgen. Hopelijk helpt de informatie in deze artikelen:

  • Gebruikersgegevens herstellen die na een Thunderbird-update zijn verdwenen
  • Profielen – Waar Thunderbird uw berichten en andere gebruikersgegevens bewaart
  • Profielbeheerder – Thunderbird-profielen aanmaken en verwijderen

We horen graag of het lukt e.e.a. te herstellen!
creator: markh2

content: if you need to reset your password, you need to log onto the email provider site. Thunderbird cannot do that. if you copied the profile from another PC, thunderbird has the old password in settings>privacy&security. although that may not work on a different computer.
